page.title: 14Entertainment,Five Roads.
page.content: {The Waunwyllt Inn.} The name of this popular inn translates into 'Wild Meadow'. The present owners have been there for 4 Years and bought it for its own sake rather than because of its situation in the locality. The owners are keen to maintain the traditional appearance of the place and have tastefully extended and modernised it.Older regulars ralk of a ghost causing glasses to fall off shelves but the owner puts this down to Future plans include a new kitchen and accomodation.At present the resteraunt caters for 52 and its lounge can seat 110.Juke boxes and video-games are out but on New Years Eve a folk singer entertains.20 staff are employed on Saturdays and are mostly locals.20 to 30% of the customers speak Welsh.
